Class-Alchemist 20 -- Female Skilled Heritage Human Alchemist: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 19 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14

Skill Notes:
Alchemical Alacrity: Has increased Quick Alchemy effects
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for at least 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Alchemist Skills: Skill Trained (Crafting; Choose 7 from any)
Alertness: Perception Expert
Bomber: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level bombs
Chirurgeon: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level healing elixirs
Double Brew: Has increased Quick Alchemy effects
Enduring Alchemy: Has increased Quick Alchemy effects
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Mutagenist: Knows the formulas for 2 common 1st-level mutagens
Perpetual Perfection: Has increased Perpetual Infusions effects
Perpetual Potency: Has increased Perpetual Infusions effects
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Cavern Lore): Skill Trained (Cavern Lore)
Skill Training (Demon Lore): Skill Trained (Demon Lore)
Skill Training (Engineering Lore): Skill Trained (Engineering Lore)

Skill Training (Legal Lore): Skill Trained (Legal Lore)

Skill Training (Medicine): Skill Trained (Medicine)
Skill Training (Milling Lore): Skill Trained (Milling Lore)
Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Advanced Alchemy: Can use a batch of infused reagents to create 2 infused alchemical items of up to level 20 without a Crafting check during daily prep
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Alchemical Savant: Can use Crafting to Identify Alchemy on a held item in 1 action; for known formulas, gains +2 on the check and critical failures are normal failures
Chirurgeon: Can use Crafting in place of Medicine
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Combine Elixirs: (F) Uses 2 additional batches of reagents to create a single elixir that has the effects of 2 elixirs of up to level 18 once per rd
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Craft Philosopher's Stone: Knows the formula for creating a philosopher's stone
Efficient Alchemy: Can produce twice the usual number of alchemical items during downtime
Elastic Mutagen: Consuming a quicksilver mutagen allows 10' Steps and moving through tight spaces as a creature 1 size smaller
Eternal Elixir: Can indefinitely extend the duration of 1 elixir of up to level 10 that lasts at least 1 min
Extend Elixir: Doubles the duration of elixirs that last at least 1 min
Feral Mutagen: Consuming a bestial mutagen adds the item bonus to Intimidation checks
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 50 alchemical formulas
Genius Mutagen: Consuming a cognitive mutagen adds its bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, Medicine, Nature, Performance, Religion, and Survival checks and allows R60' telepathic communication
Glib Mutagen: Consuming a silvertongue mutagen negates Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance circumstance penalties and linguistic barriers
Greater Field Discovery (Mutagenist): Can use 2 polymorphic mutagens simultaneously
Greater Merciful Elixir: Can use Merciful Elixir to attempt to counteract a blinded, deafened, sickened, or slowed condition
Improbable Elixirs: Can create elixirs that replicate the effects of 4 potions of up to level 9
Infused Reagents: Can create 24 batches of infused reagents during daily prep
Merciful Elixir: (F) Creates an elixir of life of up to level 18 that also allows a +30 counteract attempt on a fear or paralyzing effect once per rd
Perfect Mutagen: Suffers no drawbacks from consuming mutagens
Perpetual Infusions: Can create 2 alchemical items of up to level 11 from research field without using infused reagents
Persistent Mutagen: Can extend the duration of a mutagen until next daily prep once per day
Potent Poisoner: +4 crafted poison DCs, up to DC 40
Quick Alchemy: (1) Uses batches of infused reagents to create 3 consumable alchemical items of up to level 20 that last until the end of the next turn
Snare Crafting: Can use Crafting to create snares and knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (1 max); master) Class DC: Alchemist: 40 (intelligence; master)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: None Weapons: Bastard Sword (+28 1d8+4 S [2h d12]; strength; expert); Lesser Bottled Lightning (+28 1d6 E R60'; dexterity; expert); Mace (+28 1d6+4 B; strength; expert); Morningstar (+28 1d6+4 B/P; strength; expert); Spear (+28 1d6+4 P R20'; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Alchemical Expertise: Class Expert (Alchemist)
Alchemical Mastery: Class Master (Alchemist)
Alchemical Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Alchemical Bombs; Unarmed Attacks)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Lobber: Thrown bombs have a 30' range
Greater Debilitating Bomb: Has increased Debilitating Bomb effects
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Medium Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
True Debilitating Bomb: Has increased Debilitating Bomb effects
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs have a 60' range
Unconventional Expertise (Bastard Sword): Attack Expert (Bastard Sword)
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Weapon Familiarity (Bastard Sword)
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)
Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Trained (Sawtooth Saber)
Bomber: Can direct a bomb splash onto a single target
Calculated Splash: Can throw a bomb to inflict 4 HP splash damage
Debilitating Bomb: (F) Modifies a bomb of up to level 18 to also inflict clumsy 1, stupefied 2, enfeebled 2, dazzled, deafened, flat-footed, or -15 Speed (save Fortitude negates) until the start of the next turn once per rd
Directional Bombs: Can restrict bomb splash effects to a 15' cone in the direction thrown
Expanded Splash: Can throw bombs to inflict +4 HP splash damage in a 10' radius
Exploitive Bomb: (F) Modifies a bomb of up to level 18 to negate resistance 20 once per rd
Feral Mutagen: Consuming a bestial mutagen gives claws and jaws the deadly d10 trait and allows increasing the Armor Class penalty to -2 to increase claws and jaws damage by 1 die step
Field Discovery: Can use 1 batch of infused reagents create 3 items from research field
Greater Field Discovery (Bomber): Can increase bomb splash radius to 15'
Greater Field Discovery (Chirurgeon): Created elixirs restore the maximum number of Hit Points
Invincible Mutagen: Consuming a juggernaut elixir gives resistance 4 to all physical damage
Mega Bomb: (1) Modifies a thrown bomb of up to level 17 to affect all creatures in a 30' radius within 60' (save basic Reflex)
Miracle Worker: Can administer a true elixir of life that restores life with 1 HP and wounded 1 to a creature dead for up to 2 rd once per 10 min
Mutagenic Flashback: (F) Regains the effects of a mutagen consumed earlier in the day for 1 min once per day
Perfect Debilitation: Debilitating Bombs require a critical success to avoid effects
Powerful Alchemy: Increases the DC for infused alchemical items created with Quick Alchemy to 40
Quick Bomber: (1) Draws a bomb and Strikes with it
Revivifying Mutagen: (1) Ends the effects of a mutagen to regain 1d6 Hit Points per 2 levels of the mutagen
Smoke Bomb: (F) Modifies a bomb of up to level 19 to also create smoke in a 10'-radius burst for 1 min once per rd
Sticky Bomb: (F) Modifies a bomb of up to level 18 to inflict persistent damage equal to the splash damage once per rd
Uncanny Bombs: Thrown bombs reduce target cover Armor Class bonus by 1 and succeed automatically on the flat check to target a concealed creature
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Iron Will: Save Expert (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Mindblank Mutagen: Consuming a serene mutagen gives immunity to detection, revelation, and scrying up to level 9
Poison Resistance: Has poison resistance 10 and +1 saves vs. poison
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Notes
Validation Errors:
Alchemist Research Field Allocation: 1 available vs. 3 allocated
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 37 allocated
